poem.title: At the Lisboa
poem.author: Peter McCarey
poem.text: Les jeux sont faits. Les jeux Sont faits. Arretez tout. Coop the Portingale, cut the pontoon. The banyan hasn't a croup to thrash The tarnished estuary coughs up its cash At the handover From typhoon to China Macao, Star of the Sea, Descends to heaven.
